attributes.action: ALL taxis should have a camera within the car for riders and drivers safety
attributes.additional_details: taxi drivers are supposed to get you home safe un harmed, not in my case, friday 4th august 2023 i was sexually assaulted by my taxi driver, there was no cameras, not even a name badge on show, perhaps if there had of been a camera it would have prevented this from happening
attributes.background: make it mandatory that all taxi drivers should have a camera within the car for the rider and drivers safety

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636505
